xtc.lang.cpp
Class HeaderFileManager.Include

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.cpp.HeaderFileManager.Include
Direct Known Subclasses:
HeaderFileManager.Computed, HeaderFileManager.PFile
Enclosing class:
HeaderFileManager
protected abstract static class HeaderFileManager.Include
extends Object

This class abstracts away both a single header and computed headers that have to include several headers in different context.

Method Summary
abstract  boolean end()
          Determine whether the stream of tokens of the header is done.
abstract  String getName()
          Get the full path of the header.
abstract  String getPath()
          Get the parent directory of the header.
 boolean isComputed()
          Determine whether the include is a computed one.
 boolean isPFile()
          Determine whether the include is a regular one.
